body_html:
Ok it looks like the last commit fixed it. In particular it was

diff --git a/aten/src/ATen/native/cpu/ReduceOpsKernel.h b/aten/src/ATen/native/cpu/ReduceOpsKernel.h
index 09a2142..422e9e4 100644
--- a/aten/src/ATen/native/cpu/ReduceOpsKernel.h
+++ b/aten/src/ATen/native/cpu/ReduceOpsKernel.h
@@ -11,18 +11,13 @@ namespace native {

 template <CPUCapability C> struct sumImplC {
   static void function(Tensor &result, const Tensor &self, size_t dim,
-                       bool all) {
-    throw std::logic_error("Function not yet implemented for " +
-                           CPUCapability_to_string(C));
-  }
+                       bool all);
 };

 template <CPUCapability C> struct prodImplC {
   static void function(Tensor &result, const Tensor &self, size_t dim,
-                       bool all) {
-    throw std::logic_error("Function not yet implemented for " +
-                           CPUCapability_to_string(C));
-  }
+                       bool all);
 };
+
 }
 }

I'm not sure why this is necessary for MSVC, but not gcc etc.
